author: @ChristianPost
title: Hillsong Church Loses Another U.S. Campus, Australia Free Speech Case with Elon Musk's X, Pope Francis Hospitalized
text:
Hillsong Church Loses Another U.S. Campus, Australia Free Speech Case With Elon Musk's X, Pope Francis Hospitalized
Sponsored by WatersEdge: Invest with purpose? With WatersEdge Kingdom Investments, you can! We offer great rates that multiply your resources and build churches. Learn more at: https://bit.ly/3CxWtFz
Top headlines for Tuesday, February 18, 2025
In Australia, a pivotal free speech case unfolds as Elon Musk's X is entangled in legal proceedings following an online post by Canadian activist Billboard Chris, drawing government attention. Meanwhile, in India, Christian leaders grapple with questions regarding whether President Biden addressed the escalating attacks on minority communities during his recent meeting with Prime Minister Modi. In England, a female pastor of an Anglican church faces backlash for incorporating the trans-inclusive Progress Pride flag into a Communion table display, igniting a debate on inclusivity within religious spaces.
